title: Evenepoel takes back control in UAE Tour ITT, but new summit finish looms
tags: surprise stage 1 victory;Evenepoel vs UAE at the UAE Tour: The most tantalising showdown yet in 2026With six wins in a Red Bull-Bora Hansgrohe jersey already this season, Evenepoel will now face fierce competition from UAE teammates Del Toro and Yates at their ‘home race’.Escape CollectiveKit Nicholson
